pullRequest.title: Kourend library features
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds a visual indicator on screen pointing to the location of the book which the player is currently being asked to retrieve. This is the same indicator used by the cluescrolls plugin.


Additionally, this changes the colors of the books in the sidebar to the following:

Green: requested book, book not in inventory
Orange: not requested book, book not in inventory
White: book in inventory


Closes #10418

nodes.bodyText:
Remove this blank line

  
    
      
        Suggested change
This should be run on the client thread. Also, the plugin already keeps track of books the player is holding--this doesn't need to be calculated again.

commit.message:
kourendlibrary: Indicate books not in inventory

This commit changes the Kourend library panel to show a different color
for books which are not the target based on whether they are in the
player's inventory or not. Previously, the target book would be shown in
green and all other books would be listed in white. Now, non-target
books in the player's inventory are shown in white and those the player
does not have are shown in orange.

Co-authored-by: Jordan Atwood <jordan.atwood423@gmail.com>

afterCommit.message:
kourendlibrary: Show a hint arrow above target book

This commit adds a configuration to the Kourend library plugin to
display a hint arrow above the target bookcase. (when it is known)

Co-authored-by: Jordan Atwood <jordan.atwood423@gmail.com>
